about_the_game:
In this immersive simulation you will go from a novice trader to a highly respected business person. Start off living in the shame of poverty and use what little you have to make your start as an entrepreneur in the yard sale world.

Buy

Buy items from various places around town. Find great deals at yard sales. Visit the flea market for rare finds. Learn how to spot a deal or a fake. Save up your cash to test your luck at the daily storage auction or find a great deal online on the Flippin' Marketplace.

Clean Dirty Items

Some items are in rough shape but its nothing a good cleaning won't fix. Dirty items are harder to inspect but often come at a discount. Make them shine to attract new customers.

Repair Damaged Items

You got your new item home to clean up but oh no it's damaged. Have no fear. With the right tools and know-how you can fix that up no problem.
Repair cracked items with our easy to use system. With just a can of putty and a little know-how you can have it fixed up in a jiff.
Polish your repair skills to unlock new tools, fix more, clean faster, clean and repair on the go  and get the most profit out of each item.

Rank Up Your Skills

Gain experience as you fix up items allowing you to use the best tools in town.
Buy and sell to gain experience unlocking more business opportunities.
Run, peddle, dumpster dive, dig up treasure and magnet fish to improve your stamina and open up new transportaion opportunities.

Scavenge

Find lost treasure in many different places around town. Explore to find new equipment to help you find even more.

  • Dumpster dive

  • Metal detect

  • Magnet fish

  • Pick locks

    Housing

    Start in your humble trailer in Trout River Trailer park. Buy and sell to prove yourself as a worthy tenant to open up new rental opportunites, or save up all your cash and buy a place to really make your own.

    Hire Employees

    Head over to the Tool Store and pick up a work station to expand your yard sale empire. Work stations must be placed on a rented or owned property, with each location providing different amounts of potential employees with varying skills.

    Sell

    Everything must go! Everything in town can be refurbished and sold for a hefty profit. Get ready to yard sale! Unload valuable items online on the Flippin' Marketplace for even more profit. Grab an office set up from the post office and see what people are looking to buy today.

name: Yard Sale Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 TI or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: An open world yard sale simulator. Buy, repair and sell your way to the top. Shop yard sales, hold your own yard sale, buy a market stand, upgrade your stand or open a shop in town to sell all your newly acquired valuables.
